modules.title: Java 3x3 TTT
modules.subtitle: Learn the basics of a Java CLI app
outputs: A basic 3x3 TTT
100% code coverage
Human vs Computer
If possible, unbeatable
outcomes: Basic understanding of static typing
Understand how a Java project is structured

modules.title: Java 4x4 performance
modules.subtitle: Learn the basics of a Java CLI app
outputs: A TTT that responds to all user input in less than 2sec.
A blog post detailing what bottlenecks were found and how.

modules.title: Java Echo Server
modules.subtitle: What are Sockets and why do they matter?
outputs: A server app that will echo any message sent over a socket
A client app that will send its input to the server
outcomes: Understand sockets and how to separate your app from them

modules.title: Java Chat server
modules.subtitle: Talking should be a fun exercise.

modules.title: Java koans
modules.subtitle: Basic syntax of the language

modules.title: Java Guilded Rose
modules.subtitle: Refactoring and pattern matching

modules.title: Java HTTP server
modules.subtitle: A challenge to be experienced!
